00076   struct HistPar_t {
00077     HistPar_t() : _firstIndex(0), _rebin(0), _logY(false), _maxY(-DBL_MAX),_minY(DBL_MAX) {};
00078     void setFirstIndex(UInt_t first_index) {_firstIndex=first_index;};
00079     void setRebin(UInt_t rebin) {_rebin=rebin;};
00080     void setLogY(bool log_scale) {_logY=log_scale;};
00081 
00082     UInt_t rebin() const {return _rebin;};
00083     UInt_t firstIndex() const {return _firstIndex;};
00084     bool logY() const {return _logY;};
00085 
00086     void setValue(Double_t a_value) {
00087       _maxY=std::max(a_value,_maxY);
00088       _minY=std::min(a_value,_minY);
00089     };
00090 
00091     void setRange(Double_t min_val, Double_t max_val) {
00092       _maxY=max_val;
00093       _minY=min_val;
00094     };
00095 
00096     void resetRange() {
00097       _maxY=-DBL_MAX;
00098       _minY=DBL_MAX;
00099     };
00100 
00101     const Double_t &min() const {return _minY;};
00102     const Double_t &max() const {return _maxY;};
00103 
00104     UInt_t _firstIndex;
00105     UInt_t _rebin;
00106     bool   _logY;
00107     Double_t _maxY;
00108     Double_t _minY;
00109   };

00114   class GroupPar_t {
00115   public:
00116     GroupPar_t() {};
00117 
00118     HistPar_t &par(const Key_t &hist_key) {
00119       if (!_par.hasKey(hist_key)) {
00120         _par.assign(hist_key,HistPar_t());
00121         return _par[hist_key];
00122       }
00123       else {
00124         return _par[hist_key];
00125       }
00126     };
00127 
00128     const HistPar_t &par(const Key_t &hist_key) const {
00129 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00130       assert( _par.hasKey(hist_key) );
00131 #endif
00132       return _par[hist_key];
00133     };
00134 
00135     void setCurrent(const Key_t &current) {_current=current;}
00136     const Key_t &current() const {return _current;}
00137 
00138   private:
00139     Key_t _current;
00140     KeyMap_t< HistPar_t > _par;
00141     
00142   };
00143 
00144   HistPar_t &getHistPar(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type, const Key_t &hist_key) {
00145     try {
00146     if (!_groupPar[type].hasKey(group_key)) {
00147       _groupPar[type].assign(group_key,GroupPar_t());
00148       return _groupPar[type][group_key].par(hist_key);
00149     }
00150     else {
00151       return _groupPar[type][group_key].par(hist_key);
00152     }
00153     } 
00154     catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00155       std::cerr << "getHistPar::" << err.what() << std::endl;
00156       throw err;
00157     }
00158   }
00159 
00160   const HistPar_t &getHistPar(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type, const Key_t &hist_key) const {
00161 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00162     assert ( type < HistMgr::kNTypes );
00163     assert (_groupPar[type].hasKey(group_key));
00164 #endif
00165     return _groupPar[type][group_key].par(hist_key);
00166   }
00167 
00168   const Key_t &currentHistogramCollection(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type) const {
00169     return _groupPar[type][group_key].current();
00170   }
00171 
00172   void setCurrentHistogramCollection(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type, const Key_t &new_key) {
00173     if (!_groupPar[type].hasKey(group_key)) {
00174       _groupPar[type].assign(group_key,GroupPar_t());
00175     }
00176     _groupPar[type][group_key].setCurrent(new_key);
00177   }
00178 
00179   bool hasCurrent(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type) const {
00180     if (! _groupPar[type].hasKey(group_key)) return false;
00181     return (_groupPar[type][group_key].current().isSet() || !_groupPar[type][group_key].current().name().empty());
00182   }
00183 
00184   KeyMap_t< GroupPar_t > _groupPar[HistMgr::kNTypes];
